title: Two-Factor Verification
verificationSuccessProceed: 2FA successfully verified! You can now proceed.
manualEntry: Or manually enter this secret key:
2FASetupMessage: You have successfully created an account!
scanInstructions: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app (e.g., Google Authenticator, Authy).

error.userDataMissing: Cannot set up 2FA: User data missing. Please try signing up again.
error.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
